IdentityVerificationProcFld.name: IdentityVerificationProcFld
IdentityVerificationProcFld.description: Used to configure the questions or criteria for verifying the identity of a caller. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

CustomFieldLabel.description: The custom label for the field that contains the verification data.

DataSourceType.description: The source type of the data.

DeveloperName.description: The developer name of a record.

FieldDataType.description: The type of data stored in an external data source field.

FieldName.description: The label of the field that contains the verification data based on the selected field type.

FieldValueFormula.description: Stores the formula that's applied to the field value.

IdentityVerificationProcDtlId.description: The label of the relevant Identity Verification Process Detail record.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the record is active (true) or not (false).

IsManualInput.description: Indicates whether the user can manually enter the identity verification details (true) or not (false).

Language.description: The languages in which translation of record labels is supported.

MasterLabel.description: The label of the Identity Verification Process Field record.

NamespacePrefix.description: The namespace prefix associated with this object. Each Developer Edition organization that creates a managed package has a unique namespace prefix. Limit: 15 characters. You can refer to a component in a managed package by using the namespacePrefix__componentName notation.

SequenceNumber.description: The sequence number of the field.
